alert.note: Alert for Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nueces, northwestern San Patricio, northeastern Jim Wells and southeastern Live Oak Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1245 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sandia, or 8 miles south of Mathis. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mathis, Orange Grove, Lake City, San Patricio, Sandia, Argenta, Westdale, Tynan, Lakeside, Lake Corpus Christi and Pernitas Point. This includes Interstate 37 between mile markers 27 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Jim Wells; Live Oak
